(\{ "members", "\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\
The Great House of Bisclavret\\\\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\ \
~ Strength. Honor. Vigilance. ~\\\\ \
\
\\r\\n\Maintain these three virtues at all times, and the world will fear, love and respect you.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nLet no evil deter you from these Virtues.\
\
\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\
The Dawn of the Bisclavret Inauguration\\\\\r\\n\\r\\n\ ~The stars, they are portentous, and now I know in my heart of hearts that we must cast out the last of the olden ways, and embrace our destiny as a young, new race of rulers, chosen by destiny.\
\
\\r\\n- First Duke and last King of the Bisclavret - Riddock Dianamh-Gaisce, mac Slaine, ua mac Gaisce Mac Roth\
\
\
The previous being a direct quote from our deific forefather, First Duke, and Last King of the Bisclavret regarding methods necessary to attain the status of a noble house, and his faith therein that such a thing would be accomplished. \\r\\n\
\
May his Spirit be Ever peaceful, bathed in the Light of S'allumer's Grace, knowing that his true descendants still yet follow his wise guidance. \" \})

(\{ "members", "\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Asymmetrical dress\ \\r\\n\
This elegant full-length dress features a bodice-fit top with a form-fitting princess cut, accentuated by a button-up flap that covers the normal front lacing to create an asymmetrical design that flows to a hem spanning over ten feet. With a surround collar and side-laced closures this simple, yet meticulous design makes it a convenient piece for most any occasion.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Balmoral hat\ \\r\\n\
Traditional Bisclavret headwear, shaped much like a beret with decorative dicing along the bottom. Two ribbons hang from the back and can be tied.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Belted plaid\ \\r\\n\
A blanket of tartan cloth draped over the torso and belted at the waist of the wearer to show the colours of their clan.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Cross-breasted jerkin\ \\r\\n\
This close-fitting jacket features a cross-breasted design meant for swordplay and style. It exhibits a fashionable merger of fine lines and functionability allowing for movement and grace. It comes complete with \$(this.trait:metal) hardware and matching button closures.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Envelope bag\ \\r\\n\
A flat, rectangular bag with a triangle-shaped top flap that folds over like an envelope to hide the contents within.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Fly plaid\ \\r\\n\
Like the belted plaid, this is draped over the left shoulder of the wearer, but pinned at the shoulder with a brooch.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Full plaid\ \\r\\n\
Similar to the belted plaid, it is wrapped about the torso and hangs almost to the ankles of the wearer. It usually matches the tartan of the kilt.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Ghillie brogues\ \\r\\n\
The Brogue is a style of low-heeled shoe or boot characterized by multiple-piece, sturdy uppers with decorative perforations (or \\"brogueing\\") and serration along the pieces visible edges.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Ghillies\ \\r\\n\
These are specially designed for several types of dance as soft shoes similar to dancing slippers. This particular style is typically crafted from soft leather with laces criss-crossing over the length of the shoe, around the sole and tied at the ankle.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Glengarry hat\\\r\\n\
The glengarry bonnet is a traditional boat-shaped hat without a peak made of thick-milled material with a toorie on top, a rosette cockade on the left, and ribbons hanging down behind.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Leather holster baldric\ \\r\\n\
It provides a comfortable and stylish way to arm oneself against enemies. A wide belted strap of leather wraps diagonally across the front and back of the body and is secured by a buckle just at the chest. The holster itself rests against the wearer's left or right hip, depending upon which side they draw from.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Kilt belt\ \\r\\n\
A wide band of thick leather fastened around the waist and secured with a large, rectangular buckle. Though kilts are fastened by straps and buckles this is purely decorative.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Leine\ \\r\\n\
A bag-sleeved loose tunic typically belted at the waist. It hangs loose around the shoulders, tied with a slit-neck and laces or bunched ties.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Waist coat\ \\r\\n\
\A sleeveless upper body garment which typically extends to the thighs. It is regularly worn over a dress shirt or neckerchief, and below a proper coat as an integral port of male formal wear.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\V-cut bodice\ \\r\\n\
A definite must for any swordswoman, this garment boasts a V-cut on the front which rolls smoothly down to the rear and high sides to allow for maximum comfort and movement. The supple bodice fit is accentuated by a button-up flap that covers the normal front lacing making for a double-layered effect. It bears silken laces along the sides along with shiny grommets.\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\Waist coat with full cuffs\ \\r\\n\
This long-sleeved jacket features a series of stylish buttons that run down the center to aid in opening and closing the garment. It stops just at the waist, and is traditionally worn with kilts or pants.\" \})

(\{ "visitors", "\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\
The House of Bisclavret\\\\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\nThe Great House of Bisclavret is a newcomer to the game of thrones. Only three generations ago, the Bisclavret emerged as a noble family from amongst the savage wolves of the Phelans. Their military might was so undeniable that the other Great Houses were forced to acknowledge them as nobles. Some consider Bisclavret still wild and only half-civilized. Yet they are as capable of refined behavior as any.\
\
\\r\\n\
\\
Notable Members\\\\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\r\\n \
\\r\\n \ Name \\\r\\n \ Rank \ \\r\\n \ Appointed Position\\\r\\n \\\r\\n \
\\r\\n \ Lady Eilionoir Sutharlainn \\\r\\n \ Bisclavret Baroness \\\r\\n \ Ambassador\\\r\\n \\\r\\n \
\\r\\n \ Lord Ralston Buchanan\\\r\\n \ Bisclavret Viscount \\\r\\n \ Military Advisor \\\r\\n \\\r\\n \
\\r\\n \ Lord Azru MacMagnus \\\r\\n \ Bisclavret Baron \\\r\\n \ Quartermaster \\\r\\n \\\r\\n \
\\r\\n \ Sir Kaine Blackedge \\\r\\n \ Bisclavret Knight \\\r\\n \ Captain of the Guard \\\r\\n \\\r\\n \
\\r\\n \ Dame Asterin Whitehorn \\\r\\n \ Bisclavret Knight \\\r\\n \ Envoy and House Archivist \\\r\\n \\\r\\n \
\\r\\n \ Mistress Polgara Augrene \\\r\\n \ Bisclavret Thane \\\r\\n \ Trade Representative \\\r\\n \\\r\\n\\
\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n" \})

(\{ "members", "\A draft of Household roles within the Bisclavret. The rings are \suggestions\. Individuals may warrant a higher or lower type of ring based on their personal merit and deserving.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Ambassador\ (Leader of the House, relations with other Houses) - Gold - Knight or Noble\
\\r\\n\\
Military Advisor - Silver - (Advises and confers with Ambassador in military matters)\\r\\n\
Captain of the Guard - Silver - (Commmands Household Guard and Field Guard)\\r\\n\
Quartermaster - Silver - (Logistics for the Guard)\\r\\n\
Reeve - Silver - (Handles legal disputes and problems)\\r\\n\
Spymaster - Silver - (Head of Indiciateurs)\\r\\n\
Envoy(s) - Bronze or Silver - (Handle relations with other houses and guilds)\\r\\n\
Chief Linguist - Bronze - (Leads Translators)\\\r\\n\\r\\n\Chamberlain\ (Chiefly responsible for internal Bisclavret activities) - Silver\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Cupbearer - Silver - (Personally serves nobles)\\r\\n\
Butler - Silver - (Manages household personnel)\\r\\n\
Steward - Silver - (Manages household property and logistics)\\r\\n\
Treasurer - Silver - (Manages household finances, treasures, and relics)\\r\\n\
House Historian - Bronze - (Studies history of House and Calabria)\\r\\n\
House Archivist - Bronze - (Maintains House records)\\r\\n\
Governess - Bronze - (Cares for House children, provides education, supervision)\\r\\n\
Officer of the Household Guard - Silver - (Head of Bodyguards; provides House member security)\\r\\n\
Recruiting Officer(s) - Bronze - (Responsible for bringing in and training new members to House)\\r\\n\
Adjudicator - Bronze - (Acts as judicial champion in internal disputes. Mostly honorary role given Triskellian's legal system)\\r\\n\
Chaplain - Bronze - (Cleric of the Church of S'allumer for House)\\r\\n\
Doctor - Bronze - (Leader of house healers)\\\r\\n\\r\\n\Trade Representative\ - Silver - (Runs profitable businesses of the house)\
\\r\\n\\
Master of Shipping - Silver - (House shipping and sea trade)\\r\\n\
Master of Crafts - Silver - (House crafters, artisans and services-for-hire)\\r\\n\
Master of Caravans - Silver - (House stables and overland trade)\\r\\n\
Officer of the Field Guard - Silver - (Head of caravan and shipping security)\\r\\n\
Scoutmaster - Silver - (Leader of Scouts)\\r\\n\
Almoner - Bronze - (Charitable works of house)\\\r\\n\\r\\n\Noble Retainers\\\r\\n\\
Bodyguard - Bronze or Silver\\r\\n\
Squires - Bronze or Silver\\r\\n\
Secretaries - Bronze or Silver\\\r\\n\\r\\n\Female Noble Retainers\\\r\\n\\
Lady-in-Waiting - Silver (gentry required) (OOC: Informed by staff that this is a Non-Nobility position and is essentially just a glorified Handmaiden)\\r\\n\
Handmaiden - Bronze or Silver\\\r\\n\\r\\n\Male Noble Retainers\\\r\\n\\
Gentleman-at-Arms - Silver (gentility or nobility only)\\r\\n\
Bodyservant - Bronze or Silver\\\r\\n\\r\\n\General Householders\\\r\\n\\
Guards\\r\\n\
Scouts\\r\\n\
Artisans\\r\\n\
Bards\\r\\n\
Indiciateurs (Spies)\\r\\n\
Crafters\\r\\n\
Scholars\\r\\n\
Translators\\\r\\n\
[guildlink target=\\"default\\"]Main Page[/guildlink]\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n" \})

(\{ "members", "\
Bisclavret Teachers\\\r\\n\\r\\n\First Teacher:\\
\\r\\nShe is a tiny hourglass badger, with uneven, course white fur, and short black hair. Squinty light grey eyes are set above a flat nose and a full mouth, complete with wide lips. Stubby trim nails, on dirty hands, and stubby feet are also visible. It is wearing a shirt, a pair of pants and a pair of shoes.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\Skills:\ Squire, dodge, fencing, dilettante, armor, offensive, tailor, jeweler, gemcutting, trading, defensive, scholar, seamstress, woodcarving, woodcutter, merchant, western, soldier, parry, \first-aid, healer, arquebusier\ (new!).\
\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\Second Teacher:\\
\\r\\nHe is a spindly waifish wolf, with even, shaggy red fur, and trimmed dull mouse brown hair. Watery saffron eyes are set above a tiny nose and a large mouth, complete with full lips. Stubby stubby nails, on dainty hands, and trim feet are also visible. You also note her expressive ears and short muzzle. It is wearing a tunic.\
\
\\r\\n\Skills:\ Sword, axe, polearm, dagger, mercenary.\
\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Other Teachers\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Bisclavret Bards: music, entertainer\\r\\n\
Bisclavret Craftsmen: woodcarving, carpenter, weaponsmith\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n" \})

(\{ "hidden", "\
Artists and Entertainers\\\r\\n\\r\\n\See other guild:\ \Bisclavret Bards\\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Miss Aqualyna - bard (musician and teacher)\\
\
\\r\\nAqualyna is a slim delicate forest cat, with trimmed, silky fawn fur, and waist-length flowing chocolate brown hair. Almond aqua eyes are set above a fine nose and a heart-shaped mouth, complete with sensual lips. Long manicured claws, on manicured hands, and slender feet are also visible. You also note her fine eyebrows, dainty ears and long smooth tail. She is carrying a flute.\\r\\n\\r\\n\
Formerly Employed\\\r\\n\\r\\n\Miss Danni - a bard (singer and dancer)\\
\
\\r\\nDanni is an elfin voluptuous fox, with long, silky copper fur, and shoulder-length flowing chocolate brown hair. Round fern green eyes are set above a long nose and a heart-shaped mouth, complete with full lips. Long manicured claws, on slender hands, and dainty feet are also visible. You also note her arched eyebrows, attentive ears and long bushy tail. (Left House.)\
\
\\r\\n\Miss Ote - a bard (singer and musician)\\
\
\\r\\nOte is an elfin sleek fox, with silky copper fur, and long silky sable hair. Almond jet-black eyes are set above a thin nose and a tiny mouth, complete with thin lips. Long sharp claws, on slender hands, and slender feet are also visible. You also note her light eyebrows, pointed ears and long fuzzy tail. She is carrying a small lap-harp. (Departed town.)\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\
Scholars and Translators\\\r\\n\\r\\n\Filtiarn\\
\
\\r\\nFiltiarn is a large arctic wolf, with long, sleek white fur, and shoulder-length smooth pale blonde hair. Sharp royal blue eyes are set above a chiseled nose and a firm mouth. Short trim claws, on strong hands, and smooth feet are also visible. You also note his arched eyebrows, attentive ears and prominent muzzle.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Rowf Hunter\\
\\r\\n\Languages:\ Fluent: Canine (native), Wolf, Rodent; Near Fluent: Fox; Modest Fluency: Western, Dusky, Signing; Minor: Southern, Northern, Eastern.\
\
\\r\\nRowf is a large athletic shepherd dog, with long, silky stained light brown fur, and silky ginger hair, worn pulled back with an accent braid. Watery dark brown eyes are set above a long nose and a full mouth, complete with full lips. Long curved claws, on long hands, and long feet are also visible. You also note his light eyebrows and long ears.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Sophia Anieri\\
\\r\\n\Subjects:\ \
\
\\r\\nSophia is a petite buxom rabbit, with short, silky white fur, and waist-length wavy strawberry blonde hair, worn cascaded. Wide pink eyes are set above a button nose and a tiny mouth, complete with pert lips. Short manicured claws, on dainty hands, and large feet are also visible. You also note her arched eyebrows and expressive ears.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Millinya\\
\
\\r\\n\Languages:\ Northern, Southern, Dusky, Eastern, Western.\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Lyam\\
\\r\\nLanguages Fluent in Wolf and Cat, adequate in northern, eastern, western, and southern.\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Kenina\\
\\r\\nFluent in the languages of Western and wolf. Adequate grasp of the languages Canine, Eastern, Northern, and Old\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\
Seamstresses\\\r\\n\Aysun\ - Handmaiden of Viscountess Kenina\
\
\\r\\n\Alacian\ - Handmaiden of Viscountess Kenina\
\
\\r\\n\
[guildlink target=\\"default\\"]Main Page[/guildlink]\
\\r\\n\\r\\n" \})
